I imagine it wouldn't be too hard to change the bacground file to a graphics file, but I don't know how exciting that would be without any units or anything.  of course if you just wanted a preview image for your map you could just mark where other stuff is approximately.

Anyway I'm back at school now but my computer isn't here yet.  It should arrive sometime in the next couple of weeks (had it mailed from home) and then maye I'll have some time and we could actually start doing some stuff on the editor.  We do need to figgure out how to split up the work though.  I don't really have much of a clue about building windows and displaying things in them still but maybe one of these days I can get a grip on that.  Anyway once my computer gets here I'll take a more careful look at the design specs that we made and let you know what parts I feel comfortable with.  Now if only my course load will co-operate. . .
